title: RP/IP on PBE
body: I just got my pbe account and when i logged in i dident have any RP/IP. i had heard that before you get your RP/IP you have to log out and then in so i did that and afther that i was not lvl 30 or could buy anything or had RP/IP. So how do you get your RP/IP och your pbe account.

replies.body:
Sometimes there's a delay in the PBE stipend and level boost hitting your account. If you don't see it update in the next day, I recommend submitting a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist from our end! ^.^

If you have any other questions, let me know.
